Name: Blaston Spectator
About the game: Following the runaway success of Blaston, VR’s biggest dueling competition, streamers and sports fans alike can now view matches from the comfort of their PC with the Blaston Spectator App! Created with the audience perspective in mind, the Blaston Spectator app gives users access to helpful broadcast tools designed to enhance the viewing experience. Features: Spectate specific matches using Blaston’s existing room code system Follow an entire Knockout Tournament using the tournament code system Choose from multiple camera angles to follow the action in the best way possible Access broadcast-quality overlays including selected weapons layouts, health statistics and more Want to be the star of the show as well as a streamer? Be sure to add the full Blaston experience to your Steam Library today! /
